actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain cash rentals of farmland will not cause recapture of the special estate tax valuation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that cash rental of farmland to a member of the decedent's family for a qualified use will not cause recapture of the special estate tax valuation.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain cash rentals of farmland will not cause recapture of the special estate tax valuation.
